DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of infrared thermal imaging in adjunctive diagnostic screening for lower limb deep venous thrombosis (DVT).
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Application of Infrared Thermal Imaging Detecting Venous Thromboembolism
